name: ChromaScore
description:
A game for the Coding Blocks game jam (2023 edition),
20-22 jan. 2023

« Everything is backwards »

Description

ChromaScore is a rhythm game... but the DJ kinda sucks, and you've got to deal with it.

Play with the ←↓→ arrows, or the ASD (qwerty) or QSD (azerty) keys.
Left is cyan, Down is yellow, Right is magenta

EVERYTHING IN THE GAME WAS MADE FOR & DURING THE JAM!

Every visual asset in the game was made during the Jam, same for every track (only exception is the font). We challenged ourselves to develop an Arcade/Rhythm game starting from scratch in 72 hours, and are pretty proud of it!

The Team

Lena Herau
Mael Viriot
